title: Best of The Herd: 11/20/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/20/2019
description:
Colin explains why the Clippers are already disappointed with Kawhi Leonard and LeBron James is a major reason why. He thinks Jason Garrett might be coaching for his job against the Patriots. The College Football Playoff Committee continues to send a message about the SEC and Colin is fine with it. Plus, 2x NBA Champion and former Warriors F David West comes in studio to talk about the hidden drama of the Warriors during their dynasty and why he isn't surprised LeBron is playing so well with the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
